com.threerings.presents.data
Class InvocationObject

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.presents.dobj.DObject
      com.threerings.presents.data.InvocationObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Streamable
public class InvocationObject
extends DObject

A single invocation object is created by the server invocation manager and is used to receive invocation request messages from the client. The server presently delivers invocation messages to the client via the client object.
